# _General Hospital_ cast members

_[General Hospital](/wiki/General_Hospital "General Hospital")_ is an American
television [soap opera](/wiki/Soap_opera "Soap opera"), airing on
[ABC](/wiki/American_Broadcasting_Company "American Broadcasting Company").
Created by [Frank and Doris Hursley](/wiki/Frank_and_Doris_Hursley "Frank and
Doris Hursley"), the serial premiered on April 1, 1963. The longest-running
cast member is [Leslie Charleson](/wiki/Leslie_Charleson "Leslie Charleson"),
who has portrayed [Dr. Monica Quartermaine](/wiki/Monica_Quartermaine "Monica
Quartermaine") since August 17, 1977, also making her one of the [longest-
tenured actors in American soap operas](/wiki/List_of_longest-
serving_soap_opera_actors#United_States "List of longest-serving soap opera
actors").[1][2] Former cast member [Rachel Ames](/wiki/Rachel_Ames "Rachel
Ames") was previously the series' longest-running cast member, portraying
[Audrey Hardy](/wiki/Audrey_Hardy "Audrey Hardy") from 1964 to 2007, and
making guest appearances in 2009 and 2013, the latter for the series' fiftieth
anniversary.[3] Ames made a special appearance on October 30, 2015.[4][5]
Actors [Genie Francis](/wiki/Genie_Francis "Genie Francis") and [Kin
Shriner](/wiki/Kin_Shriner "Kin Shriner"), who portray [Laura
Spencer](/wiki/Laura_Spencer_\(General_Hospital\) "Laura Spencer \(General
Hospital\)") and [Scott Baldwin](/wiki/Scott_Baldwin "Scott Baldwin"), are the
second and third longest-running cast members, having joined _General
Hospital_ in February and August 1977, respectively.[6][7] Actress [Jacklyn
Zeman](/wiki/Jacklyn_Zeman "Jacklyn Zeman") — who portrays [Bobbie
Spencer](/wiki/Bobbie_Spencer "Bobbie Spencer") — is the fourth longest-
running cast member, joining the serial in December 1977.[8] Actress [Jane
Elliot](/wiki/Jane_Elliot "Jane Elliot"), who joined the serial in June 1978
as [Tracy Quartermaine](/wiki/Tracy_Quartermaine "Tracy Quartermaine"), is the
fifth longest-running cast member, joining _General Hospital_ in June 1978
until her departure in May 2017.[9][10][11][12] Former cast member [Anthony
Geary](/wiki/Anthony_Geary "Anthony Geary"), who portrayed [Luke
Spencer](/wiki/Luke_Spencer "Luke Spencer"), was the sixth longest-running
cast member, having joined _General Hospital_ in November 1978.[13] The
following list is of cast members who are currently on the show: the main and
recurring cast members, or those who are debuting, departing or returning to
the series.
